0: To roughly mix several different things together.

0: To follow something that is just right behind.

0: For the inside and outside of something to be reversed.

0: For the order or position to be changed to the contrary; for the orders or positions to be mixed at random.

0: turn something over; turn something inside out

길 떠날 준비를 뒤에서 거들며 돌보아 주다.

0: To repeatedly look over and search things.
